column_description: A unique identifier for each driver, represented as an integer
The name of the driver, represented as text
value_description: Kasey Kahne, Matt Kenseth, Tony Stewart, Denny Hamlin *, Kevin Li

column_description: A foreign key linking to the 'country' table, representing the driver's country of origin, stored as an integer
The age of the driver, represented as an integer
The car number associated with the driver, represented as a real number
The make of the car driven by the driver, represented as text
The total points earned by the driver, represented as text
The total number of laps completed by the driver, represented as a real number
The total winnings earned by the driver, represented as text
